Title: Customer Service
Writer: Graham Wagner, Shawn Boxe, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Andrew Law (story editor), Rachele Lynn (story editor), Shawn Boxe (staff writer)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: The guys struggle for funding to launch the latest iteration of Pied Piper. Erlich seeks to join the new VC firm formed by Laurie and Monica. Dinesh and Gilfoyle clash over the alpha build.
